Room.Name: Edge of a Mangrove Swamp
Room.Description: The mangrove forest extends to the edge of the water, where the ocean meets the shore. The tangled roots of the mangrove trees reach out into the water like a web of gnarled fingers, providing a home for a diverse array of marine life. The still waters of the mangrove swamp are dotted with islands of sand and mud, while schools of fish swim among the roots. The air is thick with the sounds of life, from the chirping of crickets to the calls of seabirds. The sea beyond the mangroves is calm and inviting, stretching out towards the horizon in a shimmering blue expanse. The boundary between land and sea is not a line, but a transition, with the mangroves serving as a bridge between the two realms.

Exit.Description: You can see a faint light shining through the mist in this direction.
You can see a faint light shining through the mist in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: Avalon is a 25 - 45 level area. There are some aggressive mobs contained herein, so do not venture within unless you are certain that you are capable of handling it.

Room.Name: Wading in a Mangrove Swamp
Room.Description: The mangrove swamp is a dense, tangled jungle of twisted roots and knee-high waters. The murky water is alive with a wealth of marine life, including crabs, shellfish, and schools of fish that dart amongst the roots. The twisted trunks of the mangrove trees rise up from the water, supporting a lush canopy of leaves and branches that provides a home to countless birds and other wildlife. Sunlight filters down through the leaves, dappling the water below with light and shadows. The air is thick with the hum of insects, the calls of birds, and the occasional splash of a fish or crab. Amidst the thicket of roots, it is easy to lose one's way.

Exit.Description: You can see a faint light shining through the mist in this direction.

Room.Name: Broken Shrine Amidst the Mangroves
Room.Description: This is a lake shrine to some small, unnamed deity. There is a small standing stone with a rude altar in front of it. The altar is scattered with various offerings; bread and flowers are strewn about the stones and altar. The cold mist from the lake drifts over you, chilling you to the bone.

Exit.Description: All you can see to the east is heavy fog hanging over the Lake of Avalon.

Room.Description: The mangrove swamp is a dense, tangled jungle of twisted roots and knee-high waters. The murky water is alive with a wealth of marine life, including crabs, shellfish, and schools of fish that dart amongst the roots. The twisted trunks of the mangrove trees rise up from the water, supporting a lush canopy of leaves and branches that provides a home to countless birds and other wildlife. Sunlight filters down through the leaves, dappling the water below with light and shadows. The air is thick with the hum of insects, the calls of birds, and the occasional splash of a fish or crab. Amidst the thicket of roots, it is easy to lose one's way.

Exit.Description: You can see a faint light shining through the mist in this direction.
You can see a faint light shining through the mist in this direction.
You can see a faint light shining through the mist in this direction.

Room.Name: Wading in a Mangrove Swamp

Amidst the thicket of roots, it is easy to lose one's way.

Exit.Description: You can see a faint light shining through the mist in this direction.
You can see a faint light shining through the mist in this direction.

Room.Name: A Sandy Beach
Room.Description: You slog through the lake, which is waist deep at this point. The water is cold and soaks through your boots, chilling you. You can hear the sounds of large creatures moving through the water and look around nervously. The mist is thick here, with faint openings to the north and west

Exit.Description: You can see a faint light shining through the mist in this direction.
You can see a faint light shining through the mist in this direction.

Exit.Description: You can see a faint light shining through the mist in this direction.

Room.Name: Lake
Room.Description: You slog through the lake, which is waist deep at this point. The water is cold and soaks through your boots, chilling you. You can hear the sounds of large creatures moving through the water and look around nervously. The mist is thick here, with faint openings to the north and east.

Exit.Description: You can see a faint light shining through the mist in this direction.
You can see a faint light shining through the mist in this direction.

Room.Name: Lake
Room.Description: You slog through the lake, which is ankle deep at this point. The water is cold and soaks through your boots, chilling you. You can hear the sounds of large creatures moving through the water and look around nervously. The mist is thick here, with faint openings only to be seen to the east and the north.

Exit.Description: You can see a faint light shining through the mist in this direction.

Room.Name: Lake Trail
Room.Description: You emerge finally from the lake to find yourself on a trail leading around the edge of the water. The trail is muddy and uneven, and the mist curls from the lake to wrap around your feet and remind you of the chilly water. The air is cool, and you can sense a faint tang of pine.

Exit.Description: The trail continues it's uneven path to the east.
To the south is a solid wall of mist that hangs over the lake of Avalon.

Room.Name: Lake Trail
Room.Description: You continue up the lake trail, avoiding the branches of the pine trees that grow along the path. The woods around you are silent, and you have the feeling that you are being watched. You jump in startlement as a deer breaks through the underbrush and races back into the woods.

Exit.Description: You can see the boat house of Avalon lying to the north.
The trail winds it way upwards to the east, towards a large hill.
The trail to the west leads down to the edge of the lake.

Room.Name: Boat House
Room.Description: You have entered the boat house of Avalon. Small boats, with carved lions heads at their prows, lie about the room. Small Pictish men move among the boats, repairing and inspecting them. To the east is you can see a small shrine, and the way west is blocked by a door.

Exit.Description: A shrine and circle of stones lies to the east.
The trail that follows the lake lies to the south.
The door to the west leads into the Lake Keeper's private quarters.

Room.Name: Shrine of Bath
Room.Description: You have intruded upon a shrine to the God Bath, who has watched over these islands for many centuries before the Roman's ever set foot on it, although perhaps in a different incarnation. The standing stones of the shrine are set in a circle/square configuration for the eternal perfection of the sacred circle. A small altar sits in the center of the stones, bearing upon it the dagger and sword of Bath, and the cup that holds the water of life.

Exit.Description: The archway to the west leads back into the boathouse.

Room.Name: Lake Keeper's Quarters
Room.Description: This room is the private household of the Lake Keeper of Avalon. The room is barren of everything except for a sleeping mat and a small table that holds a basin for water. The walls are covered with diagrams of the moon in her courses, and herbs hang from the ceiling.

Exit.Description: The door to the east leads back into the boat house.

ExtraDescription.Description: O D D ) ( D D O

Room.Name: Lake Trail
Room.Description: You continue upon the muddy path winding its way around the edge of the lake. The forest is still quiet, with all the creatures falling silent at the sound of your passage. The only sound you can hear is the wind, sighing through the pine trees that line the path.

Exit.Description: The trail continues its way upwards to the east.
The lake trail winds its way down to the west.

Room.Name: Lake Trail
Room.Description: You stop as you reach this section of the trail. The trail itself continues east and west, but to the north you can see a tall hill rising over the lake. You glance again as you see a greyish purple mist forming along one side of the hill, and a door appears out of the fog. Could this be one of the hollow hills spoken of in the legends?

Exit.Description: The hill to the north is swathed in a grey-purple mist, and a door can be faintly seen in the side.
The lake trail winds its way up to the east.

Room.Name: Hollow Hill
Room.Description: You have entered the hollow hill, the entrance into Faerie. To the north and west, corridors lead to unknown rooms, and the sound of singing is heard from the north. The hill is formed of stone blocks, and torches sputter along the walls.

Exit.Description: The swirling mist to the south hides the exit from this place.
The mist hides what lies beyond the path to the west.

Room.Name: Realms of Faerie
Room.Description: You have entered into the realms of Faerie. As your feet step off the misty path you followed to get here, it disappears, and the way closes behind you. You look around in panic as you realize you are trapped, perhaps forever, within the realms of Faerie. A man sits on a grassy knoll in front of you, playing a harp. He glances up as you enter, and smiles at you. "Welcome to Faerie" he says. "I am Taliesin, the Merlin of Britain."

Room.Name: Realms of Faerie
Room.Description: You follow the path onto a grassy hilltop. You glance behind you, and notice in panic that the way behind you has sealed completely. A small, dark woman is here, gathering flowers. She glances up as you enter, and then continues. You recognize the flowers as goldenseal, an herb well known for it's medicinal uses.

Room.Name: Lake Trail
Room.Description: You continue along the muddy trail leading into Avalon. All around you the woods are alive with the sounds of animals and birds. The water brushing against the shore of the lake creates a soothing sound, and you occasionally hear a fish breaking the lake's surface. There is a shrine to the north, and the trail continues east and west.

Exit.Description: A small shrine lies to the north.
The lake trail continues to the east.
The lake trail slowly continues its way down to the west.

Room.Name: Lake Trail
Room.Description: The trail continues its slow way along the lake. In the distance you can hear bird calls and the sound of the water lapping against the shore. The world seems peaceful here, and a chill breeze dips under your cloak, brushing against your skin. You tighten your cloak around you and continue along the trail.

Exit.Description: You can see a tall hill rising to the east.
The trail continues to the west.

Room.Name: Shrine of Sulis
Room.Description: You have intruded upon a ritual honoring the god Sulis, also known as the god of Dreams. Seven women move about the shrine, calling up the god to send them visions of power in their dreams. The shrine itself consists of a pool of water with steps leading down into it, and a marble altar set in the center of the pool.

Exit.Description: The trail winding itself around the lake lies to the south.

Room.Name: Lake Trail
Room.Description: The lake trail reaches a bend here, continuing to the north and the west. The ground beneath your feet is muddy, and gets soggier the farther north you continue. You can hear the faint sounds of frogs and crickets, and the sounds of the lake reach you faintly here. You can smell the scent of pine and oak in the air, and a squirrel scurries up the side of a nearby tree, chattering at you angrily.

Exit.Description: The trail to the north becomes marshy and treacherous.
The lake trail continues to the west

Room.Name: Lake Trail
Room.Description: The ground is becoming very marhy on this part of the trail, and water from the lake begins to lap against your feet as you continue on. The footing is very treacherous here, and you clutch at a nearby tree as the ground slides beneath you. The forest around you is silent, and you can faintly smell the scent of apples in the air.

Exit.Description: You can smell the scent of apples to the north.
The trail is dryer to the south.

Room.Name: Lake Trail
Room.Description: You emerge from the marsh, and look around. There is gravel paving the trail from here, and the trees are trimmed back. Flowers bloom along the trail, and you recognize many medicinal herbs growing here. The scent of apples is heavy in the air, and you can see an apple grove to the west.

Exit.Description: The lake trail continues to the north.
The ground to the south is very marshy and treacherous.
An apple grove rests to the west, spreading the scent of apples and blossoms through the air.

Room.Name: Apple Grove
Room.Description: You have entered an apple grove. The scent of apples and blossoms almost presses you to the ground, and blossoms are strewn on the ground beneath your feet. Ripe apples hang within reach, and you take one off a tree and bite into it. The heady scent of apple passes over you and a sweetness bursts within your mouth. A small trail leads to the north.

Exit.Description: You can see a circle of stones to the north.
The trail wends to the east, back to the lake trail.

Room.Name: Standing Stones
Room.Description: You have entered a ring of standing stones. Huge monoliths tower above you, awing you into silence. The holy thorn grows here, that Joseph of Arimathea planted when he came to those shores. The holy thorn once represented the oath that the christian priests would never rise against the druids, who were at Avalon before them, but now that oath is broken. Faintly in the distance, as if in a dream, you think you can hear the sound of church bells through the mist.

Exit.Description: A small trail leads south into an apple orchard.

Room.Name: Crimson Clan Vestibule
Room.Description: Blood fills your eyes in this room. A portrait of the crimson clan leaders of past and present is on the wall. Many a virgin have offered themslves as a sacrifice for the good of the clan here. A sign says: Drop extra clan orbs and rings on the floor after you kill the virgin, and don't forget your portal.

ExtraDescription.Description: Clan Floater Crimsons Crystal of Honor Stats: 100hps 50mana 1con 1wis 5hit 5dam 1. Ring of the Shadows Object 'ring shadows' is type jewelry, extra flags hum burn_proof. Weight is 0, value is 0, level is 15 Affects hit roll by 2. Affects armor class by -10. Affects constitution by 2. Affects mana by 15. Affects damage by 2. 2. A White-Blue Sapphire Ring Object 'white-blue sapphire ring' is type jewelry, extra flags burn_proof. Weight is 0, value is 0, level is 30. Affects damage by 2. Affects armor class by -15 Affects mana by 25. Affects hp by 75. 3. Eight-sided Ring Object 'eight-sided ring is type jewelry, extra flags glow burn_proof. Weight is 0, value is 0, level is 45. Affects damage roll by 5. Affects hit roll by 5. Affects mana by 50. Affects armor class by -20. Affects hp by 120. 4. Crystal Ring Object 'crystal ring' is type jewelry, extra flags hum burn_proof. Weight is 0, value is 0, level is 60. Affects mana by 50. Affects armor class by -35. Affects save vs spell by -4. Affects save vs breath by -4. Affects hp by 100. 5. Affects mana by 50. Affects armor class by -50.
There is much blood on the portrait.

Room.Name: Lake Trail
Room.Description: The lake trail continues here. The trail winds away from the lake, creating a slightly drier path as you walk along it. The oak trees rustle slightly as you continue, and you can smell the scent of heather and acorns. The wind moans through the branches, and ruffles through your hair.

Exit.Description: The trail to the north continues along the lake edge.
The lake trail continues to the south. You can smell the faint scent of apples from that direction.

Room.Name: Lake Trail
Room.Description: The trail dips once more down close to the lake, creating a muddy mess out of the trail. The trees begin to thin out here, though to the north you can see an enormous oak tree towering over the island. To the west you can see a gatehouse leading into the Lake House, and you hear a faint moaning to the north.

Exit.Description: You can hear a faint moaning, like a spirit in torment, to the north.
The trail winds it's way to dry ground south of here.
The path to the west is an overgrown trail leading to the gate of the Lake House.

Room.Name: Lake Trail
Room.Description: As you walk along the path, you are drawn up short by a huge oak tree. You hear a moaning coming from the tree, and draw closer nervously. In the cleft of the trunk, a human figure writhes in agony. He reaches out one clawlike hand towards you and whispers 'Mercy, oh have mercy." You draw back in alarm as you recognize Kevin, the false Merlin of Britain, who was accused and found guilty of treason to the high priestess of Avalon, and to the holy order of the druids.

Exit.Description: The trail continues into quieter parts to the south.
The trail continues its way west, away from the tree.

Room.Name: Lake Trail
Room.Description: You have reached the end of the trail that extends around the lake. To the west lies the walls of the Lake House, and the gate house itself lies to the south. The trail ends in a small clearing here, with a stone bed in the center. It is here that the seers of Avalon fast and pray for visions of the future. The air is heavy with the scent of oak and pine, and the wind rustles gently through the leaves.

Exit.Description: You can see a tall oak tree rising to the east, and you can hear a faint moaning sound from that direction.
The gatehouse of Avalon lies to the south.

Room.Name: Gatehouse
Room.Description: You emerge into a gatehouse that leads into the Lake House. Named as a gatehouse only as a courtesy, this room is little more than a sitting room where visitors can await the presence of one of the priestesses or women who live in the house. Hard stone benches line the walls and there is a pitcher of water on a small table.

Exit.Description: You can see a small clearing to the north.
An overgrown trail leads to the path around the lake.

Room.Name: Lake House
Room.Description: You enter the cool, dark halls of the Lake House. The floors are of a cold grey stone, and a freezing breeze blows across your feet. You can hear the murmur of voices from within, and the occasional rustle of a robe. The gatekeeper's room lies to the north, and Niniane's room is to the south.

Exit.Description: The Gatekeeper's room lies to the north.
The archway to the east leads back into the gatehouse.
The room to the south belongs to Niniane.
The hallway continues to the west.

Room.Name: Morgause's Room
Room.Description: This room is filled with fine clothing and mirrors. It is obvious that the inhabitant of the room is more concerned with her looks and possessions than in learning wisdom from the priestesses. Morgause herself is sitting in front of a mirror, brushing her long, red hair and plotting against her cousin, Arthur.

Exit.Description: The doorway to the south leads back into the hallway.

Room.Name: Niniane's Room
Room.Description: Niniane's room is filled with rocks and coral, and other objects the lady in question has collected over the years. Most prominient are several large pieces of quartz crystal displayed on the bedside table. The room is filled with heavy wooden furniture, all carved with ivy and tendrils of roses.

Exit.Description: To the north lies the hallway leading through the gate house.

Room.Name: Gatekeeper's Room
Room.Description: The private room of the gatekeeper of Avalon is an austere place, with only a hard bunk, chest, and small table gracing the room. The walls are of a dark grey stone, and a small brazier rests on the table, barely warming the chill in the air. The gatekeeper herself sits by the table, spinning only a hard bunk, chest, and small table gracing the room. The walls are of wool.

Exit.Description: The hallway lies to the south.

Room.Name: Lake House
Room.Description: You continue along the hallway that runs through the lake house. Acolytes and priestesses pass by you on their way to their errands, and there is a a faint murmur to be heard throughout the house. The rustle of robes blends in with the faint murmuring and creates a very peaceful atmosphere. Rooms lie to the north and south, and the hallway continues east and west.

Exit.Description: The doorway to the north leads into Morgause's room
The hallway continues to the east.
The hallway continues to the west.

Room.Name: Nimue's Room
Room.Description: Nimue's room is draped in black, and the faint tang of sorrow hangs heavy in the air. Everywhere you look, there are reminders to the lady of her betrayal of the Merlin of Britain. Kevin's harp rests on the bedside table, and his staff leans against the wall. The lady herself lies on her bed, weeping quietly for the false Merlin.

Exit.Description: The doorway to the north leads back into the hallway.

Room.Name: Lake House
Room.Description: The hallway splits into a three-way intersection here, going to the east, west and south. Women hurry by, and the occasional pictish warrior. The sounds of chanting come from the south, and the faint sounds from the lake are almost lost to you here.

Exit.Description: Morgaine's room lies to the north.
The hallway splits off to the east here.
The hallway splits off to the south.
The main hallway of the Lake House continues to the west.

Room.Name: Morgaine's Room
Room.Description: You have entered the rooms of Morgaine, who will be high priestess of Avalon after Viviane rejoins the great wheel. The room is a barren place, hosting only a table, chair, and bedstand. There is a black robe laying across the bed, and a sheaf of drying herbs rests on the table. A sickle knife rests beside the sheaf. Morgaine sits at the table, preparing some herbal concoction.

Exit.Description: The archway to the south leads back into the hallway.

Room.Name: Lake House
Room.Description: This wing of the Lake House is very quiet, with only the occasional acolyte wandering by. The murmuring you heard is now faint, and the sounds from the rooms are muffled. Your footsteps sound loud against the cold stone floor, and you can hear echoes reflecting back off the walls towards you.

Exit.Description: The hallway continues to the north.
The hallway ends to the south.
The hall branches off once again to the west.

Room.Name: Lake House
Room.Description: You have reached the end of this branch of the hallway. The stone around you is of cold, grey slate, and there are rushes strewn across the floor. A murmur of voices can be heard from the east, where Viviane's quarters are, and the sounds of prayer come from the west, where Igraine's room lies.

Exit.Description: The hallway continues north.
Viviane's room lies to the east.
The archway to the west is decorated with crosses, an odd sight here in the Lake House.

Room.Name: Viviane's Room
Room.Description: You have entered the rooms of the high priestess of Avalon. The room is barren, except for a bed and bedside table. Apparently all the work of the house is done elsewhere. A chart of the moon phases hangs on the wall and a silver crescent lies on the bed. Viviane stands looking out the window. She doesn't seem to notice your presence.

Exit.Description: The hallway lies to the west.

Room.Name: Igraine's Room
Room.Description: You have entered Igraine's room. The room is decorated with crosses and pictures of events important to christianity. It is indeed an odd sight to greet your eyes, as Igraine is a daughter of the Holy Isle of Avalon. A large bed sits in the center of the room, and a bedside table beside it holds a cup of wine. Lady Igraine kneels at a prie-dieu underneath a large copper cross hanging on the far wall.

Exit.Description: The doorway to the east leads back out into the hallway.

Room.Name: Lake House
Room.Description: You have entered a smaller hall that branches of the main hall of the Lake House. Grey robed acolytes pass you, stepping quietly as if to avoid causing any noise here. You can hear still the faint murmur of voices and chanting to the east, but to the west is silence.

Exit.Description: The main hallway lies to the east.
Raven's Room lies to the west.

Room.Name: Raven's Room
Room.Description: You enter a dark room, with only a large window opening to the west, where you can see a full moon. The room contains only a hard pallet on the causing any noise here. You can hear still the faint murmur of voices and woman sits on the pallet watching the moon.

Exit.Description: The archway to the east leads to the hallway.

Room.Name: Lake House
Room.Description: You continue along the hallway, your boots scuffing the clean stone floors beneath your feet. The walls here are hung with tapestries of flowers and herbs and other plants. You see careful embroidery beneath each plant detailing it's medicinal uses, and conclude that these must be tools used in the training of priestesses.

Exit.Description: The hallway continues to the north.
The hallway continues to the east.
Mordred's room lies to the west.

Room.Name: Mordred's Room
Room.Description: You have entered a room filled with swords and spears and shields. It is obvious that the owner of this room is more interested in the physical than the spiritual world. Mordred himself stands here, looking out the window, pondering his mother's request that he become the next Merlin of Britain.

Exit.Description: The doorway to the east leads into the hallway.

Room.Name: Lake House
Room.Description: You approach the end of the hallway that wends through the Lake House. To the west you can see another gate house that leads to parts unknown. The stones beneath your feet are cold, and a chilly breeze blows from the western gate.

Exit.Description: The hallway continues to the south.
A gatehouse lies to the west.

Room.Name: Gatehouse
Room.Description: You have entered a gatehouse that leads into parts unknown. You gaze back at the Lake House, then turn and resolutely continue into the dark gate.

Exit.Description: The hallway leading into the Lake House lies to the east.

NPC.name: trout
NPC.description: A silver-grey trout darts into the water reeds as you approach.
NPC.longDescription: A trout is hiding in the water reeds.

NPC.name: carp
NPC.description: A golden carp darts through the water, brushing against your legs as you wade through the lake.
NPC.longDescription: A carp darts past your legs.

NPC.name: bass
NPC.description: A large bass swims here, obviously secure in his position of king of the lake. He glares at you as you approach.
NPC.longDescription: A bass glares at you aggresively.

NPC.name: eel
NPC.description: A small eel darts past you, it's grey body almost hidden against the water that laps around you.
NPC.longDescription: An eel slips past you, wiggling into the sand near your feet.

NPC.name: tadpole
NPC.description: A tadpole, grey and silver, swims gently around in circles by your feet, nibbling at the lake plants.
NPC.longDescription: A tadpole swims peaceably through the water, ignoring you.

NPC.name: blue-gill blue gill
NPC.description: A blue-gill, fins waving frantically, darts in and out between your feet.
NPC.longDescription: A blue-gill darts in and out of the bushes by your feet.

NPC.name: goose
NPC.description: A large goose with white and black feathers swims on the lake. It sees you and interprets your intrusion as an attack. It screams and charges for you.
NPC.longDescription: A goose sees you intruding and attacks you with a scream.

NPC.name: duck
NPC.description: A duck, brown with golden tinting on its wings, glares at you menacingly as you pass it.
NPC.longDescription: A duck glares at you menacingly as you walk by it.

NPC.name: salmon
NPC.description: A pink and grey salmon, gills wriggling in the water, swims past your feet.
NPC.longDescription: A salmon, pink and grey, swims past your feet.

NPC.name: godling shrine
NPC.description: The godling of this shrine gazes at you from his stone. His pale, misty shape is difficult to discern against the slate grey sky, but his black, marble hard eyes pierce into you.
NPC.longDescription: The godling who watches over the shrine looks down at you from his stone.

NPC.name: deer
NPC.description: A brown deer with white markings on its tail and chest looks at you in startlement, and bolts into the woods.
NPC.longDescription: A deer looks at you, and bolts into the woods, startled.

NPC.name: bath
NPC.description: Bath is a tall, stone like figure, who glares down at you as you enter his shrine. You sense that he knows you are unbelievers.
NPC.longDescription: Bath, god of the isles, looks at you from his shrine.

NPC.name: lake keeper
NPC.description: The keeper of the lake looks up as you enter, and raises her eyebrow. "Was there something I can help you with?" She asks.
NPC.longDescription: The Keeper of the Lake of Avalon sits at her desk.

NPC.name: pict boat man men
NPC.description: A small man, with dark skin and black hair, moves among the boats, repairing and inspecting them. He does not seem to notice your presence.
NPC.longDescription: A small, dark man, obviously a pict, moves among the boats.

NPC.name: Taliesin
NPC.description: Taliesin is an old man with greying hair. He carries a large harp with golden strings, and he smiles at you gently as you approach him.
NPC.longDescription: Taliesin glances up at you from his harp.

NPC.name: faerie lady sidhe
NPC.description: A short, dark skinned woman of the Sidhe race gather herbs here. She glances up at you with disinterest, and goes back to her work.
NPC.longDescription: A lady of the faerie realms gathers herbs here.

NPC.name: sulis
NPC.description: Sulis, the god of sleep, watches his worshippers as they prepare the ritual to invoke his holy sight.
NPC.longDescription: Sulis, the God of Sleep, watches over his worshippers.

NPC.name: priestess woman
NPC.description: A young woman dressed in the robes of a worshipper of Sulis moves into the water to invoke the god of Sleep.
NPC.longDescription: A priestess of Sulis chants to invoke the god.

NPC.name: squirrel
NPC.description: A brown squirrel rushes up a tree as you approach and chitters at you angrily. Apparently it doesn't appreciate your intrusion.
NPC.longDescription: A squirrel chitters at you angrily from a tree.

NPC.name: chipmunk
NPC.description: A striped chipmunk scurries up a tree when you approach and watches you nervously.
NPC.longDescription: A chipmunk scurries up a tree at your approach.

NPC.name: racoon
NPC.description: You discover a wily racoon going through your travel rations, eating the best parts.
NPC.longDescription: A racoon looks up from your travel bag, a pack of rations dangling from its mouth.

NPC.name: girl student
NPC.description: A young girl walks to her next class, her books clutched in her arms as she hurries along.
NPC.longDescription: A young student walks through the halls, going to her next class.

NPC.name: acolyte
NPC.description: An acolyte of the Goddess, her hair carefully braided back and her blue robes neatly arranged, peers at you intently as you enter the room.
NPC.longDescription: An acolyte of the Goddess looks at you intently.

NPC.name: priestess
NPC.description: A priestess of the Goddess, dressed in blue robes with the goddesses' crescent upon her brow, gazes at you and raises an eyebrow.
NPC.longDescription: A priestess of the Goddess raises her eyebrow at you.

NPC.name: seeress
NPC.description: A seeress, her eyes covered by a blindfold, walks along the halls as if she is completely confident in her way.
NPC.longDescription: A seeress strides through the halls, seemingly unaffected by her blindfold.

NPC.name: Gatekeeper
NPC.description: A young woman with black hair and eyes sits at her desk and looks through scrolls. She glances up at you and says "Welcome to Avalon."
NPC.longDescription: The Gatekeeper of Avalon sits at her desk.

NPC.name: Niniane
NPC.description: Niniane is a tall, willowy girl with long brown hair. She looks up at you with a smile, and arches an eyebrow.
NPC.longDescription: Niniane, who once trained to be Lady of the Lake after Morgaine, is here.

NPC.name: Morgause
NPC.description: Morgause sits at her bedside table, brushing out her long, red hair. She represents the fourth face of the goddess, that face which betokens death and darkness.
NPC.longDescription: Morguase, cousin to King Arthur, sits here.

NPC.name: nimue
NPC.description: Nimue, a small young woman with black hair and blue eyes, lies across her bed, weeping for her betrayal of Kevin.
NPC.longDescription: Nimue is weeping for her betrayal of Kevin, Merlin of Britain.

NPC.name: Morgaine
NPC.description: Morgaine, a small, dark woman with a look of one who has faerie blood, sits at the table, her blue robe fluttering about her feet, and the crescent of the goddess shining on her brow.
NPC.longDescription: Morgaine, Lady of the Lake, sits at her table mixing herbs.

NPC.name: Igraine
NPC.description: An old woman, with the wimple and veil of a bride of Christ, kneels at the prie-dieu and prays for her sins.
NPC.longDescription: Igraine, Arthur's mother, prays for her immortal soul.

NPC.name: Viviane
NPC.description: Viviane, a small, dark woman, stands here, gazing out the window. She gazes towards the mist that covers the lake surrounding Avalon, drawing it further and further from the world inhabited by the priests and children of the christian god.
NPC.longDescription: Viviane, Lady of the Lake, and ruler of Avalon, gazes out the window at the mist.

NPC.name: raven
NPC.description: Raven is a tall, dark haired woman. She looks at you expectantly, but doesn't speak. Of course, she hasn't spoken outside of the holy circle in 12 years, so that's to be expected.
NPC.longDescription: Raven, the seeress of Avalon, sits watching the moon.

NPC.name: mordred
NPC.description: Mordred is a tall man, with his mother's black eyes and his father's golden hair. He holds a harp, and carries a sword.
NPC.longDescription: Mordred, the king's son, stands looking out the window.

NPC.name: crimson virgin
NPC.description: She is covered in-- what else <G>-- blood.
NPC.longDescription: A crimson virgin is here.

NPC.name: robert haeffner asshole
NPC.longDescription: Hi, I'm an asshole. Kill me, please.

NPC.name: zombie
NPC.longDescription: A zombie shuffles across the room.

Item.Name: fish scale
Item.LongDescription: A fish scale is fit to cover the arms here.

Item.Name: golden ring
Item.LongDescription: A golden ring that was swallowed by the carp sits on the ground here.

Item.Name: bass bone
Item.LongDescription: A bass bone has been sharpened into a dagger here.

Item.Name: letter
Item.ShortDescription: a letter from Arthur to Morgaine
Item.LongDescription: A letter

ExtraDescription.Description: Dearest Sister, Please let us put aside all our differences, and strive to reconcile this rift that has come between us. I am willing to forgive you your treasonous behaviour with Accolon, but I must demand that you remove your son from my halls and bid him accept that he can never be king of these lands. I also must insist that you return back to me Excalibur, which is my sword, by divine right. Arthur, Pendragon of Britain.

Item.Name: ink stain
Item.LongDescription: A hardened ink stain lies on the floor.

Item.Name: fish tail
Item.LongDescription: A fish tail just the right size for you to wrap around yourself.

Item.Name: fish bone
Item.LongDescription: A necklace formed out of a fish bone lies here.

Item.Name: duck wing
Item.LongDescription: A mounted and stuffed duck wing has been tied to a pole.
Item.ExtraFlags: Hum Frost Sharp TwoHands Poison Unholy

Item.Name: goose liver
Item.LongDescription: A goose liver to thwack your enemies with.

Item.Name: salmon fin
Item.LongDescription: A necklace has been made out of a salmon fin.

Item.Name: deerskin bracelet
Item.LongDescription: A bracelet made out of deerskin lies here.

Item.Name: wool leggings
Item.LongDescription: A pair of wool leggings lies crumpled on the ground.

Item.Name: sealskin boots
Item.LongDescription: A pair of sealskin boots sit beside the bed

Item.Name: harp merlin
Item.LongDescription: The harp of Merlin rests on the table here.

Item.Name: golden earrings
Item.LongDescription: A pair of golden earrings, fashioned as a pair of walnuts, lie here.

Item.Name: dream whip
Item.LongDescription: A whip fashioned from your darkest dreams lies here.

Item.Name: acorn
Item.LongDescription: An acorn has been squirreled away for the winter here.

Item.Name: potion striped
Item.LongDescription: A potion, striped black and white, sits here.

Item.Name: racoon tail
Item.LongDescription: A racoon's tail hangs from a stick.

Item.Name: bracelet moon
Item.LongDescription: A bracelet with a moon charm dangling on it.

Item.Name: moon club
Item.LongDescription: A club with the sickle crescent of the Lake House carved on it rests here.

Item.Name: deerskin gloves
Item.LongDescription: A pair of deerskin gloves sits on the table.

Item.Name: blindfold
Item.LongDescription: A blindfold is neatly laid out on the table.

Item.Name: guisarme holy
Item.LongDescription: A holy guisarme from the isle of Avalon rests against the wall.

Item.Name: pendragon ring
Item.LongDescription: A ring with the royal crest of the Pendragon's lies here.

Item.Name: holy sword excalibur
Item.LongDescription: Excalibur, the sword from the holy Regalia, is here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Frost Sharp TwoHands Poison Unholy

Item.Name: wraps dead
Item.LongDescription: Wrappings fit for a king's corpse lie here.

Item.Name: merlin's heart
Item.LongDescription: Merlin's Heart is here, taken from him by Nimue.

Item.Name: moon crescent
Item.LongDescription: A moon crescent rests on the table here.

Item.Name: golden comb
Item.LongDescription: A golden comb with leaves scrolled across it lies on the bed.

Item.Name: sheathe belt
Item.LongDescription: The sheathe for the holy sword lies here, covered with embroidery.

Item.Name: cloak mordred's
Item.LongDescription: Mordred's cloak lies tossed across the back of a chair.

Item.Name: crimson orb honor
Item.LongDescription: A Crimson orb of honor is here.

Item.Name: crimson portal virgin
Item.LongDescription: A crimson virgin portal is here.

Item.Name: ring harmony
Item.LongDescription: A ring of harmony.

Item.Name: vine clasp friendship ring
Item.LongDescription: A vine clasp friendship ring

Item.Name: ring vitality
Item.LongDescription: A ring of vitality

Item.Name: ring spirit
Item.LongDescription: A ring of spirit

Item.Name: demeter's ring
Item.LongDescription: Demeter's ring is lying here.

Item.Name: ring growth
Item.LongDescription: A ring of growth

Item.Name: sharp ring
Item.LongDescription: A sharp ring

Item.Name: ring tone
Item.LongDescription: A ring of tone

Item.Name: guitar pick
Item.LongDescription: A guitar pick

Item.Name: ring beethoven
Item.LongDescription: The ring of Beethoven.

Item.Name: pulsating dragon soul
Item.LongDescription: (pulsating) A dragon soul.

Item.Name: horn satan
Item.LongDescription: A horn of Satan

Item.Name: ring doom
Item.LongDescription: A ring of doom

Item.Name: ring leadership
Item.LongDescription: A ring of leadership

Item.Name: ring despair
Item.LongDescription: A ring of despair

Item.Name: heart dragon
Item.LongDescription: A heart of a dragon.

Item.Name: ring scholarship
Item.LongDescription: A ring of scholarship.

Item.Name: Ring knowledge
Item.LongDescription: A ring of knowledge

Item.Name: ring learning
Item.LongDescription: A ring of Learning.

Item.Name: ring gloom
Item.LongDescription: A ring of gloom.

Item.Name: aura magic
Item.LongDescription: An aura of magic.

Item.Name: elder's globe prime material plane
Item.ShortDescription: an Elder's Globe of the Prime Material Plane
Item.LongDescription: An Elder's Globe of the Prime Material Plane.

Item.Name: globe vertigo
Item.LongDescription: A globe of vertigo

Item.Name: ice rock sylvan
Item.LongDescription: An ice rock ring.

Item.Name: force nature
Item.LongDescription: A force of nature.

Item.Name: moon infinity
Item.LongDescription: A moon of infinity

Item.Name: crimson lantern crystal
Item.LongDescription: A crystal lantern is here.

Item.Name: crimson lantern emerald
Item.LongDescription: A koem-runed emerald lantern is here.

Item.Name: eight-sided lantern crimson
Item.LongDescription: An eight-sided llantern is here.

Item.Name: crimson lantern sapphire
Item.LongDescription: A bluish white sapphire lantern is here.

Item.Name: shadowy lantern crimson
Item.LongDescription: A shadowy lantern is here

Item.Name: golden rose ring
Item.LongDescription: A golden rose ring

Item.Name: yellow rose ring
Item.LongDescription: A yellow rose ring

Item.Name: blue rose ring
Item.LongDescription: A blue rose ring

Item.Name: pink rose ring
Item.LongDescription: A pink rose ring

Item.LongDescription: An intricate golden filigree armband
